name: MxxConverter
description: Mxx Converter Contract. Contract to allow a user to deposit Mxx token to be converted to bMxx on the binance smart chain.

eventDecorators.name: ConversionCompleted
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: ConversionRefunded
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: ConversionsCompleted
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

eventDecorators.name: NewConversion
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted. - Events.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Whenever a new child contract is deployed, a `NewContract` event containing the new child contract address MUST be emitted.

functionDecorators.name: completeConversion
functionDecorators.description: This function allows owner to set a conversion as completed.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: - The index of the conversion Access Control: Only Owner.

functionDecorators.name: completeConversions
functionDecorators.description: This function allows owner to set 2 or more conversions (in an index range) as completed.

parameterDecorators.name: _idFrom
parameterDecorators.description: - The start index of the conversion.

parameterDecorators.name: _idTo
parameterDecorators.description: - The end index of the conversion Access Control: Only Owner.

functionDecorators.name: depositForConversion
functionDecorators.description: This function allows a user to deposit Mxx and start a conversion.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: - The amount of Mxx to convert.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: refund
functionDecorators.description: This function allows owner to perform a refund for a conversion item.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: - The index of the conversion Access Control: Only Owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFee
functionDecorators.description: This function allows owner to set a new fee.

parameterDecorators.name: _fee
parameterDecorators.description: - The fee Access Control: Only Owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
